titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to address the use of intrathecal pumps.
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to address the use of intrathecal pumps.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Amends the Controlled Substances Act to revise the definition of "dispense" to include the delivery of a controlled substance through the use of an intrathecal pump by a practitioner acting in the usual course of professional practice.
